channel.title: CVE Feed for inoplugs -- WP-Backgrounds Lite
channel.description: The latest CVEs for inoplugs -- WP-Backgrounds Lite

item.title: CVE-2021-4419|2024-08-03T17:23:10.774Z -- inoplugs -- wp-backgrounds%20lite
item.description: The WP-Backgrounds Lite plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in versions up to, and including, 2.3. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the ino_save_data() function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to save meta data via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
